Constant Field Values

ATTR_FILECOUNT

static final java.lang.String ATTR_FILECOUNT
This is a count of files. If set, it asserts how many files are expected. If clear, it is set on deployment as a log of how many files were found.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTR_MINFILECOUNT

static final java.lang.String ATTR_MINFILECOUNT
This is a count of files. If set, it asserts how many files are expected. If clear, it is set on deployment as a log of how many files were found.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTR_MAXFILECOUNT

static final java.lang.String ATTR_MAXFILECOUNT
This is a count of the max number of files that the pattern should match. If <0, there is no limit.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

listFiles

java.io.File[] listFiles()
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                SmartFrogException
Return a list of files that match the current pattern. This may be a compute-intensive operation, so cache the result. Note that filesystem race conditions do not guarantee all the files listed still exist...check before acting

Returns:
a list of files that match the pattern, or an empty list for no match
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - when the network plays up
SmartFrogException - if something else went wrong

getBaseDir

java.io.File getBaseDir()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               SmartFrogException
Get the base directory of these files (may be null)

Returns:
the base directory
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - when the network plays up
SmartFrogException - if something else went wrong
